name: Outlaws of surface
description:
You are a human being trapped deep underground.

Try to come to the surface by passing through always different generating Levels.

To pass a Level you need to touch the Checkpoint on right.

Be Careful:

Don't touch those red cubes because they will reset you to the beginning of the level and take away a heart.

The Level will regenerate and you have to start all over if you loose all 5 hearts.

Controls: 

A and D to move

SPACE to jump

R to restart (if you are stuck or sth.)

ESCAPE to pause
